name: AquaFusion Flask
description:
Elevate your hydration game with our cutting-edge water bottle, the ideal companion for every adventure. Crafted from high-grade, BPA-free materials, this sleek hydration solution ensures that you stay healthy while maintaining a minimalist style. The double-walled insulation keeps your beverages icy cold for up to 24 hours or steaming hot for 12 hours, making it perfect for everything from morning coffees to afternoon hikes. With a lightweight design and ergonomic grip, you'll find it easy to sip on the go, whether you're at the gym, on your daily commute, or exploring breathtaking trails.

Accessibility meets innovation with our one-handed flip-top lid, engineered for quick hydration during breaks in action. You'll appreciate the convenient built-in straw that provides effortless sipping, allowing you to stay refreshed

reviews.review: No me gustó este termo para nada. Se filtra cada vez que lo uso, es super molesto. Además se calienta el agua muy rápido, no dura fría. Pensé que seria mucho mejor por el precio que pague, pero es un brutto error. No lo recomiendo, guardad vuestro dinero.

I really regret buying this water bottle. First off it leaks all over the place, even when it’s closed tight. I've had it in my bag and my stuff gets all wet. The cap is super hard to screw on and off. Sometimes I just can’t get the water out at all – like it’s stuck. It's way heavier than I thought too, not convenient for carrying around. 

And honestly, I thought it would keep my drink cold but it doesn’t seem to make a difference

I bought this water bottle and it’s been nothing but trouble. Leaks everywhere, like it can never stay sealed right. Tried it on a hike and my bag got soaked. Super disappointed. Also, the plastic feels really cheap, not what I expected at all. I don’t get the hype, maybe I got a bad one but just no good experience. Goes straight to the trash for me. Don’t waste your money.

got this water bottle and it leaks everywhere!!! wasted so much water because the lid won’t close right. also, the design looks good but it’s super flimsy and feels like it’ll break if I drop it once. what’s the point of a water bottle that can’t hold water?? totally regret buying it. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
